mapper.select: SELECT po.PayOrder_idx, po.customer_idx, po.cart_idx, po.order_date, c.customer_name, c.customer_email, c.customer_phone, c.customer_add, c.customer_add_more, ca.sku_idx, ca.sku_value FROM PayOrder po JOIN Customer c ON po.customer_idx = c.customer_idx JOIN Cart ca ON po.cart_idx = ca.cart_idx
